name: string-trim
description: Remove leading and trailing whitespace from a string at a specified path

input.description: Any JSON object containing a string value at the specified path

path.description: Dot-separated path to the string field (e.g., 'data.message')

output.description: Object with trimmed string at path, or unchanged object if path doesn't exist or value is not a string

examples.description: Trim nested string with tabs and newlines
